span.data-qtipopts: {"content":{"text":"P\u0159i koupi vybran\u00e9ho hotelu, v doprovodu 2 dosp\u011bl\u00fdch osob, mohou a\u017e dv\u011b d\u011bti ve v\u011bku 2 - 15 let vyu\u017e\u00edt UBYTOV\u00c1N\u00cd ZDARMA. D\u011bti hrad\u00ed pouze cenu letenky. Nev\u00e1hejte si zaslat nez\u00e1vaznou objedn\u00e1vku, n\u00e1\u0161 prodejce V\u00e1s bude kontaktovat a sd\u011bl\u00ed V\u00e1m bli\u017e\u0161\u00ed informace. span.data-qtipopts: {"content":{"text":"P\u0159i koupi tohoto hotelu a v doprovodu dvou dosp\u011bl\u00fdch osob m\u00e1 Va\u0161e d\u00edt\u011b na p\u0159ist\u00fdlce n\u00e1rok na pobyt i stravov\u00e1n\u00ed ZDARMA.Za Va\u0161e d\u00edt\u011b zaplat\u00edte pouze cenu letenky zahrnuj\u00edc\u00ed leti\u0161tn\u00ed taxy a palivov\u00fd p\u0159\u00edplatek. Maxim\u00e1ln\u00ed v\u011bk d\u00edt\u011bte, kter\u00fd V\u00e1mi vybran\u00fd hotel akceptuje, V\u00e1m up\u0159esn\u00ed n\u00e1\u0161 prodejce. Nev\u00e1hejte si zaslat nez\u00e1vaznou objedn\u00e1vku, n\u00e1\u0161 prodejce V\u00e1s bude kontaktovat a sd\u011bl\u00ed V\u00e1m bli\u017e\u0161\u00ed informace. Nelze kombinovat s dal\u0161\u00edmi slevami.","title":{"text":"Sleva na d\u00edt\u011b"}},"style":{"classes":"aa-1"}}
